Description_lang: Infests the target with a deadly plague, causing $s1 Shadow damage every $t1 sec for $d. If the target dies while afflicted or the effect ends, this effect will gain an additional stack and jump to a nearby unit. If this effect is dispeled, it will lose a stack and jump to a nearby unit. Whenever this effect jumps, The Lich King's power will increase.
AuraDescription_lang: Deals $s1 Shadow damage every $t1 sec.Jumps to nearby target when removed or host dies.
